dict.acceptation: 羞愧；羞辱；可耻的人；羞愧感；
使蒙羞；玷辱；使感到羞愧；使相形见绌；

sent.orig: SHAME is a metadata editing and presentation framework for RDF metadata.
sent.trans: SHAME是一个RDF元数据编辑器和表示框架。

sent.orig: A man cannot be without shame, for the shame of being without shame is shamelessness.
sent.trans: 人不可以无耻，无耻之徒，无耻矣。

sent.orig: He that deceives me once, shame fall him, if he deceives me twice, shame fall me.
sent.trans: 受骗一次，别人可耻；受骗二次，自己该死。

sent.orig: We are against this war, Mr.Bush.Shame on you, Mr.Bush, shame on you.
sent.trans: 布什先生，你可耻，你可耻！

sent.orig: It's a shame I can't come on time. My business meeting ends at 7:3SHAME.
sent.trans: 真遗憾。我不能按时来了。我的商务会议7点半才结束。
